```{r}
library(tidyverse)
library(rvest)
set.seed(1)
``` 

##Problem 2

```{r}
q2_t_test = function(mu, iterations = 5000) { 
  replicate(iterations, {
    data <- rnorm(n = 30, mean = mu, sd = 5)
    t_test <- t.test(data, mu = 0) 
    broom::tidy(t_test)  
  }, simplify = FALSE) |>
    bind_rows() |>
    mutate(mu = mu)
}

values = c(0, 1, 2, 3, 4, 5, 6) 

q2_results = map_dfr(values, q2_t_test) 

```
